metadata.title: Pellet Smoker Tube, 12'' Stainless Steel Wood Pellet Smoke Tube for Cold/Hot Smoking, Portable Barbecue BBQ Smoke Generator Works with Electric Gas Charcoal Grill Smokers (Hexagon Tube+2Hooks)
features: | ADD AN EARTHY FLAVOR TO YOUR BBQ | Are you someone who loves BBQs and steak? Do you grill your meat a lot? Enhance the flavour of your meat by giving it a smoky flavour of different woods with the My Hobby Store BBQ smoker/Pellet Smoker tube that will allow you to smoke your meats with different woods like hickory, pecan, cherry, and more!

| ADVANCED SMOKER DESIGN | Compatible with most types of grills and smokers – be it gas, electric, charcoal, or pellet grills, this pellets smoke tube, which measures 12”, can easily fit into smoker grills of many different shapes. Featuring a hexagonal shaped design, this smoke tube can produce billowing smoke for up to 5 hours to help you with slow smoking.

| HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS | Made from premium quality 304 stainless steel that is very strong, durable, corrosion-resistant, and rustproof, our BBQ smoker pellet tube is heat resistant and can withstand high temperatures. With no harmful substances present, our pellet grill will not interfere with your food and is completely safe to use.

| MULTIPURPOSE VERSATILE FOOD SMOKER | Our drum smoker can be used to hot smoke chicken, pork, lamb, steak, sausages, and any meat of your choice! You can also use this outdoor smoker to cold smoke nuts cheese and more to achieve a completely natural flavour profile. This portable pellet grill is compact, lightweight, and can be carried anywhere easily.

| IDEAL GIFT FOR MEAT LOVERS | Do you want to surprise all the steak connoisseurs among your family and friends with an exciting gift that will change their BBQ experience? This smoker tube for charcoal smoker/ electric smoker/ smoker grill makes a wonderful present for all festive and non-festive occasions such as birthdays, Christmas, New Year, and more!
description: Smoking meat is a wonderful way to enhance the flavour of your food and
make your BBQ taste a whole lot better

. Through smoking, you can use different woods to infuse the flavours of the wood into the meats. My Hobby Store portable pellet grill is sure to become a useful addition to your BBQ setup and will fit in with any type of grill or smoker.
MY HOBBY STORE
PELLET SMOKER TUBE
Made from premium quality stainless steel that is strong and durable, this smoke tube will not bend or break with repeated use.
